question: As of September 2018, what machine learning algorithm is used to for cardiac arrhythmia detection from a  short single-lead ECG recorded by a wearable device?
ideal_answer: Support Vector machines( SVM) can be used for cardiac arrhythmia detection in from an ECG recorded by a wearable device.

snippets.text: SVM approach for cardiac arrhythmias detection in short single-lead ECG recorded by a wearable device

Multi-stage SVM approach for cardiac arrhythmias detection in short single-lead ECG recorded by a wearable device.<AbstractText Label="OBJECTIVE" NlmCategory="OBJECTIVE">Use of wearable ECG devices for arrhythmia screening is limited due to poor signal quality, small number of leads and short records, leading to incorrect recognition of pathological events.
